description:
Audiophile has come a long way. With this new version, we bring some really cool new features.
Audiophile is for music lovers and people who have files that won't play on the stock player.

Options menu: Sign-In to Last.fm. Now you can do your scrubbing from Last.fm

Indexer:
Search, Album, Artist, Genre, Title and Folder.
You can search by opening the "Search" list and just start typing and you music will start a list by what you type.
Audiophile lets you play from a verity of song formats. ( ra, 3gp, aac, als, m4a, mp1 & 2, mp3, mpg, ogg, ors, ram, wav, wma, and flac).

Fade and Speed controls at your finger tips.
Spin the record to advance or rewind the song or just tap on the progress bar.
Volume, Bass and Treble controls plus Pause, Play, next and previst song controls at your finger tips.
6 Band EQ for the song that need to be tweaked out or to have the songs sound just the way you like it. 

Playlist view. Tap on the Playlist icon will bring up a sub menu. There you can;
Clear Playlist And add to Playlist.

Audiophile now supports absolute path playlists and relative path playlists.
In the sub menu, you will find the "Internet" button. Type in an internet address and stream the music from the net. Supported Playlist are; XML and M3U.

Favorite’s option:
With this feature you can pick an Album, Artist, Genre or Songs as your Favorites. You will be able to see a list of your Favorites at any time with one click of a button. Use it as your very own Favorite Playlist.

YouTube Background Player: Tap on "YouTube It" will search for Artist name and list YouTube video's related to the search term.
You can hide part of the Player and un-mute the sound of the Video. It will loop until you close the YouTube Player.
